光荣特库摩于日前宣布，历史仿真游戏《三国志14威力加强版》将于5月27日推出包含假想剧本“锦马超展翅高飞”、扩充事件编辑功能在内的免费更新，并同步发售付费 DLC 称霸战记模式专用剧本“兖州争夺战”、与“平定荆南”事件组合(5个)。




在假想剧本中，马超于潼关讨伐曹操报仇雪恨后，乘胜追击进军洛阳。曹操殁后曹丕继位，其露骨 的强硬态度引起曹彰反抗。献帝亦畏惧曹丕，故与荀彧等人一同逃往洛阳。事件编辑功能也将在本次免费更新中追加功能，届时玩家可在游戏内进行体验。




与此同时，开发者也将于同日免费推出与《死或生：沙滩排球 女神假期》联动的合作武将 DLC，其中包括玛莉萝丝、霞、绫音以及海咲。开发者表示， 每个合作武将都有其专属个性与战法，美貌实力兼具的维纳斯们将华丽点缀《三国志》的世界。


<内嵌内容，请到原网页查看>

articles.description:
《大航海时代Ⅳ》威力加强版 HD 于今日在 Steam  及 Nintendo Switch 发售，国区售价249人民币。据悉，本次发售的《大航海时代Ⅳ》威力加强版 HD 收录了《大航海时代Ⅳ  PORTESTADO》及其威力加强版，更收录移植到掌上游戏机的《大航海时代Ⅳ ROTA NOVA》等的追加要素，同时还对游戏画面进行 HD 重制。


<内嵌内容，请到原网页查看>

在本作中，玩家将以16世纪的欧洲“大航海时代”为舞台，扮演探险家、商人、军人等不同身份与全世界形形色色的人们一起上演出跌宕起伏的海洋冒险。玩家的最终目的是在不同的海域中掌握霸权，搜寻沉眠于各地的“霸者之证”并最终成为七海的霸主。 




此外，收录全系列作共 219 首配乐曲的原声带的“30 周年纪念版”同步发售，国区售价为749人民币。除了游戏之外，纪念版还收录了《大航海时代》、《大航海时代 II》、《大航海时代外传》、《大航海时代 III》、《大航海时代 IV》、《大航海时代 V》、《大航海时代 VI》以及《大航海时代 Online》的所有配乐（共219首）。


<内嵌内容，请到原网页查看>
articles.title: 《大航海时代Ⅳ》威力加强版HD现已在Steam及NS发售，国区售价249起

articles.description:
登陆 NS 的女性向恋爱模拟游戏《安琪莉可 Luminarise》在今天正式发售了实体版与数字版。本作是首款登场的女性向游戏「安琪莉可」系列时隔 18 年的完全新作，也对应了简体字・繁体字。另外游戏在 NS 上还有免费 Demo，大家可以试玩女王甄试进行最初审查前的 27 天。


中文实体首批限定特典为：「守护圣珍藏透卡」，提供给首批购买中文实体版的玩家，透卡为光之守护圣 – 「犹月」，以及闇之守护圣 – 「诺亚」，两种款不同的设计共4枚。


此外，也将在本作发售的同时发布 DLC。有描写大家来到飞空都市之前的追加剧本、 使用道具后就能观赏到特别台词的「圆梦写真卡」，以及请勿打扰和可以叫出指定对象的方便道具。也将贩卖优惠的套组，敬请留意。

<内嵌内容，请到原网页查看>
(《老友记》重聚特别节目预告)
此次的《老友记》特辑原定于去年推出，但由于疫情被迫推迟拍摄。特别节目中原班人马悉数回归，包括导演、编剧以及珍妮弗·安妮斯顿 、考特妮·考克斯、丽莎·库卓、马特·勒布朗、马修·佩里和大卫·史威默六位主演。他们回到了位于伯班克的华纳兄弟录影棚，以访谈节目的形式庆祝重聚。




除去《老友记》主创外，Lady Gaga、大卫·贝克汉姆、贾斯汀·比伯、瑞茜·威瑟斯彭等也会担任特别节目的嘉宾。
主演马特·勒布朗在此前的采访中曾表示：“六个人重聚的感觉，就像这些年的时间根本没有流逝一样，只要再聚在一起，就能立刻找回当年的感觉。”
《老友记》重聚特别节目预计将于5月27日上线 HBO Max 流媒体平台，敬请期待。

(《老友记》重聚特别节目海报)
articles.title: 满满回忆杀！《老友记》重聚特别节目发布正式预告

Netflix 打造的《恐惧街》三部曲系列恐怖电影首曝官方预告，将于7月上线。


<内嵌内容，请到原网页查看>
(《恐惧街》预告)
《恐惧街》三部曲根据《鸡皮疙瘩》作者 R·L·斯坦所著的另一系列青少年恐怖小说《恐惧街》改编，丽恩·贾尼埃克（《蜜月》）执导，玛雅·霍克、萨迪·辛克、吉莉安·雅各布斯等人主演。
故事背景设定在虚构的沙迪赛德市，第一部讲述1994年，一群青少年发现困扰他们小镇几代人的恐怖事件可能都有关联——而他们可能是下一个目标。




三部曲具体上线时间为：
《恐惧街：1994》：7月2日上线；
《恐惧街：1978》：7月9日上线；
《恐惧街：1666》：7月16日上线。
喜欢恐怖片的朋友可以留意一下《恐惧街》三部曲的上线时间，不要错过。

(《恐惧街》三部曲海报)
articles.title: Netflix全新恐怖电影《恐惧街》三部曲首曝官方预告

articles.author: 人类补完委员会
articles.description:
序言
机核的朋友，你好！
这是我来机核的第二篇文章，文笔不佳，还请多多关照。
从我高三一直到大三，从高考美术工具人，到成为视觉中国签约纪实摄影师，那些闲暇的，忙碌的时光，几乎都在机核的电台、文章、资讯中度过。
每当听到核聚变开展的消息，我都超想参与，可是每次都会被各种琐事缠身。而这一次，我终于能作为一名志愿者，站在核聚变会场之中，并有幸能以我的视角，记录下种种难忘的瞬间。
虽然拍的很不全面，但我觉得对我来说，这是值得珍藏的纪念。
多图预警，真的很多……
志愿者报名的那天，我立刻拉上了同系三位好友一起报名，安排好了行程。而且我们哥儿四个都成功分到了想进入的展区——【柳叶刀+百家合】与【bilibili】两个展区。
而我被分派在【柳叶刀+百家合】中的柳叶刀展位。

(出发前在校门口拍的照片)
我们于5月13日下午出发，14日早上9点50到达北京（火车头坏了，晚点了1个半小时）。
这次为了干活儿轻便，我只带了一台相机和两枚镜头，它们分别是：


Canon EOS 5D MarkIV
Sigma 24-70mm f2.8 DG
Canon 50mm f1.4 usm
废话不多说，下面就用我的视角，带你走进2021核…
articles.title: 核聚变2021北京站志愿者摄影见闻

articles.author: no209
articles.description:
从头到脚简单介绍一下一套暴风兵的装扮里，都有什么东西。


整套盔甲的硬质部分分为四肢、肩甲、躯干、腰带、后腰炸弹桶和头盔几个部分；软质部分包含了打底衣、头套、脖套、手套。靴子算不算软质的我也说不清楚……
软装


上图从左至右：脖套、打底衣、手套、头套。
打底衣我们偏爱各类运动品牌的夏季紧身衣，冬季则偏爱优衣库等保暖内衣（虽然并没有什么用）。裹在ABS塑料片里冬不暖夏不凉，在外面晒着能热晕过去。
上肢


我们从俩胳膊开始硬质盔甲部分。
肩甲、上臂和前臂甲通常会连成一个整体。上图左边是右臂，右边是左臂，可以看到前臂的格子数量并不相同，左臂是11个，右臂是12个。这也是分辨左右的一个方法。


上臂甲（肱二头肌处）的左右区别比较明显，左上臂有个明显的窝。但是当时的原型师接受采访时表示并没有进行这样的设计，所以大家怀疑是量产的时候出了什么岔子……不过这个特点也作为了元年暴风兵盔甲的一个特点沿用至今。


我的这套采用了各种链接方式，而且还在不断进行修改，每次活动完都会有些新的问题出现，毕竟在家里套上和在外面不间断地活动几个小时，是完全不同的概念。上图中肩甲和躯干部分用四合扣链接（以前是魔术贴），上臂甲和肩甲部分…
articles.title: 暴风兵盔甲简单介绍

articles.description: 中國國家統計局公佈全國人口普查結果，指中國全國人口為14.1178億，較上一次調查下跌0.04個百分點，較十年前增加7206萬、增幅為5.38個百分點。
articles.title: 晚報：中國人口普查指全國有14.1億人，網絡輿論對數據多方面抱有懷疑

articles.title: 小端網絡觀察：成都中學生墜樓身亡，監控錄像為何總在關鍵時刻「消失」？

articles.title: 「失語就要挨罵」：「戰狼外交」能講好中國故事嗎？

articles.description: 在韓國，性別議題已然成為劃分政治傾向的一個重要指標。這一點在年輕群體中尤為突出。
articles.title: 6B4T？極端厭男？：韓國激進女權的進擊與政界的性別之戰

articles.description: 美國聯邦調查局（FBI）週一表示 ，對於美國最大輸油管道運營商Colonial Pipeline近日遭到網絡攻擊，黑客組織DarkSide的勒索軟件是罪魁禍首。FBI將繼續與該公司和其他政府部門合作調查。
articles.title: 早報：FBI確認黑客組織DarkSide攻擊美國輸油管道，該組織稱只為錢

articles.description: 印度的「2019 冠狀病毒」疫情仍然嚴峻。 世界衛生組織（WHO）首席科學家 Soumya Swaminathan 日前接受法新社專訪 ，指去年10月在印度發現的變種病毒株 B.1.617 有極強傳播力、而且有能力對抗疫苗及康復者抗體，同時警告目前印度疫情可能累積更多突變病毒，最終由全世界承受後果。
articles.title: 晚報：世衛專家建議將印度變種病毒株列入警惕級別，批評政府鬆懈引爆疫情

articles.description:
Why?
I've been working as a freelancer for more than 10 years.
Invoicing and accounting has always made me feel frustrated and stressed.

Most of the systems I tried, use complicated forms, force me to use features I don't need or have invoice designs that are terrible. There were lots of copy-pasting, repetition, and human error.

How?
We wanted Afloat to be super easy to use with a big focus on the user experience.
A ​clean and calm space that reduces the stress around invoices, expenses, and accounting.

Afloat is smart and reactive. When possible, it suggests, autocompletes, and offers a preview of the content, so everything is one click away.

And yes, we put a lot of time and care into the invoice design :-)

This is the tool we've always wanted.  
You can finally focus on what reall…
articles.title: Afloat — Create beautiful invoices in 3 clicks, without mistakes

articles.description:
NocoDB is an open source Airtable alternative.

Github : https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb 

NocoDB works by connecting to any relational database and transforming them into a smart spreadsheet interface! This allows you to build no-code applications collaboratively with teams. NocoDB currently works with MySQL, PostgreSQL, Microsoft SQL Server, SQLite, Amazon Aurora & MariaDB databases.

Also NocoDB's app store allows you to build business workflows on views with combination of Slack, Microsoft Teams, Discord, Twilio, Whatsapp, Email & any 3rd party APIs too. Plus NocoDB provides programmatic access to APIs so that you can build integrations with Zapier / Integromat and custom applications too.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

Getti…
articles.title: NocoDB — Free & Open Source Airtable alternative 🔥 🔥 🔥

articles.description:
howlongdoesittake.com. The site dedicated to answer all your questions related to time and duration. You are wondering how long does it take to watch all Star Wars movies, for the stomach to empty, to boil en egg or to drive route 66? You are in the right place at the right time. 

Our goal at HowLongDoesItTake is to share accurate, trustworthy and reliable information on “How long does it take” type questions. We use the most trusted and reliable sources to collect, curate and publish answers just about any topics. We also allow our registered users to submit their own time to our articles and compare them with others.

This is really a side project but I hope you guys find it really useful. Of course, as always, any comment and feedback are welcome :-)
        ”

articles.description:
NEW TO ZEROQODE?

Zeroqode is a suite of no-code tools that allow you to build and implement even the most daring ideas. No programming skills, no engineers or technical background required.


WHAT DO WE COME UP WITH TODAY?

We stayed focused on improving our product offering, providing better support to our users and making the whole user experience a breeze. So what did we achieve in more than a year since we last been on Product Hunt:

🧳 +24 new templates. Now we have 120+ templates! 🥳 
⚙️ +50 new plugins. Total 270+ plugins with better functionality and support.
🗣 Zero Code Online Conference. We hosted the biggest online no-code conf in 2020, if you missed it you can replay the recorded sessions
📺 Monthly Zeroqode Series for no-coders. Once per month, 1 hour webinar with great tips and insights about the no-code ecosystem from the leading players. 

SOME OTHER NEWS

We completely redesigned our website and decided to use 3D-style animations and illustrations. It was a challenging and interesting project for us (still ongoing albeit mostly done) . Check it out here, perhaps you’d feel moved to redesign your website too?:)! 

By the way our team is almost  50 and we are still hiring! 

EXCLUSIVE OFFER FOR PRODUCTHUNTERS

Grab your promo code PHUNT20 for all templates and turn your ideas into life! The promo code is valid till May 31th, 2021.

Steps to claim your promo: 
1. Click on the "Get it" Button at the top of this page
2. Find a template that is perfect for your needs. 
3. PROFIT! Apply promo code today during the template purchase checkout step.

Talk to us, drop us a line to say hello or ask a question. We'll be online all day to speak to you.

Thanks a lot for all the support 🙏 

Levon
Co-founder 
Zeroqode
        ”

        |
        Link

articles.description:
Images for designers. 💃😃

I’m a self-taught designer who loves to explore new styles – illustration, animations, icons & so on. I have been working on dozens of design projects for the last couple of years. In my initial days, I used to spend a lot of time creating every design asset from scratch - not only I lost a ton of time but also lost many projects in the process.😭 Even if I find few image sites, the images might not be compatible to use in the design software I use or the format I am looking for is not available.💔

I then started creating a list of resources with every data point that I usually have as a question in my mind - the type of file, best used for, software compatibility, etc. 🧑‍💻

After I finished the hunt of 100 websites in my design bucket, I thought why not help…
articles.title: Images for Designers — 100+ handpicked resources for designers to get images

articles.description:
How do you stay connected when you’re so far apart?



Many of us can relate; during the pandemic, people around the world have felt detached and isolated from those we love. This is especially true for those who are chronically ill, part of the aging population, or are part of other marginalized members of society. 

Tony believed that a platform capturing continuous, bi-directional biometric data could better connect him and his father. The ability to quickly access his biometrics, activity level, and location data would open a window into his father’s well-being.

But he also realized such a system could also help decentralize healthcare by lowering the barrier of entry for those often left behind in our current system. 

Remote monitoring through connected clothing could remove many of…
articles.title: Skiin Smart Clothing (Beta) — Decentralizing healthcare with smart clothing

articles.description:
`EasyOCR` we developed over a year on Github. So why do we need no code platform when we already have an open source library? What is the advantage over other OCR services?

Problems:
- There is no one AI model to fit them all. People need to tune their AI models to their specific use cases.
- Tuning AI models needs technical expertise and usually a large dataset. Two things people normally don’t have.

Our Solutions:
- No code platform: no technical expertise needed - We have another AI to train AI working behind the scenes so you don’t have to do the technical job.
- Need small dataset: With powerful data augmentation and our state-of-the-art data generation, data requirement is kept at the minimum.

And this is just the beginning. We are expanding our no code service to cover other fields of AI as well. Hope you like it!
        ”
        
Discussion
        |
        Link
articles.title: EasyOCR — NoCode AI as a service, automate text extraction from images

moyo features:

Projects

Sessions

Reports
Easily write a report with key feedback to hand. Style the report with your own branding or an image from Unsplash.

You can try moyo with a 7 days free trial (no credit card required).

articles.description:
We've built Newsletters to Kindle to let you read your newsletters on your Kindle. 

Ryan and myself are both avid readers of newsletters like Stratechery, Not Boring, Lenny's newsletters, the Hustle and many others. 

Some reasons we prefer reading newsletters on our Kindle: 

- There's no notifications or distractions
- There's no blue light, so it's healthy to read in the evening and won't ruin our sleep
- We can read on our own schedule rather than when we open the email in our inbox

Newsletter to Kindle is simple and quick to get started! Create an account and connect your Kindle in under 2 minutes, then choose which newsletters you want to receive and voilà! That's it.

Head to our website to try it for free: https://newslettertokindle.com/

Special offer for any of you signing up and upgrading to a paid plan today: you'll get 50% off your first 3 months. Use the code LAUNCH21 at checkout

Looking forward to your feedback!

articles.description:
Why chopcast?

Chopcast was built because we believe marketers have more ideas than they have time, and as marketers ourselves, we understood how tough it is to balance ambition with available resources. We wanted to make it easier for them to multiply their content efforts by easily repurposing their content into multitudes of clips across all social networks to drive more bite-size, meaningful conversations with the people that most need to hear from their brands.

Here’s more about the features.

Clip resizing

No one creates content for your discerning audience quite like you can. Shorten or extend your clips down to perfection.

Instant, automatic subtitling

Get auto-generated subtitles that instantly update in real-time as you resize your clips. Our subtitles currently hold an accuracy of 93%, making reviewing them a breeze. No additional humans or tools needed to supercharge your show. Click to edit them to perfection in any section. 

One-click aspect ratios

It's never been easier to repurpose your videos into square, horizontal, and vertical formats to suit all popular social media formats. Everything else adjusts in the background.

Intros, outros and branding

Add your branding to your repurposed videos once, and watch it get adjusted across different formats. You can also easily upload your own intro and outro cards to grab attention and stand out from the masses. Discuss it with our team today!

Product Hunt Bonus
		
We’re happy to give back to the community for the support so we are giving an extra 60 video upload minutes to you. 

Just send us a message through our website’s chat and cite code PH60M*, and our team will upgrade your account with the extra video upload minutes.

*(single use only)

Thanks! Looking forward to your feedback!
        ”
        
Discussion
        |
        Link
articles.title: Chopcast — Chop long videos into tons of social media content with ease

articles.description:
Namejax Brand Marketplace with you.

This is a side project I've been working on for a few months now. I have to admit, I'm a bit of a domain hoarder (and I know I'm not alone 😉).

How could I add more value to my unused domain names? What are people actually looking for when buying a domain name?

💡 What if I could bundle my unused domain names with the matching social media profiles...

So I came up with the concept of a "Brand Bundle"

I realised that there are many other people that have unused brand bundles that could be reused. 
And many makers, startups, products etc. looking for a consistent brand across all channels.

So... let's recycle the brands... ♻️

Why I created this?

😭 Have you ever found the perfect domain name, just to realise the Twitter or Instagram handles are already taken?

🤔 Are you struggling to come up with an original brand name?

🏆 The Namejax Brand Marketplace solves this for you!

Who is this for?

🚀 Namejax offers innovative Brand Bundles for makers, indie hackers, startups, entrepreneurs.

🚀 Find the brand for your next product and launch with a consistent name across all channels.

What is Namejax?

✅ Namejax offers curated, pre-registered, hand selected domain name and social media bundles for your next product.

✅ Get the domain and all the accounts for your brand in one go!

🤑 Do you have an unused brand that you want to sell? List it on the Namejax Brand Marketplace

What's next?

🚦 This is just the first version of the marketplace and there are already 12 brands listed, and more are coming.

⭐️ The next batch will be added on 1 June

🆕 To keep up with releases of new Brand Bundles you can register on the website or follow Namejax on Twitter @namejax


All the Brand Bundles on Namejax is 20% off for the whole launch week!!

💬 I’d love to hear your feedback!. I’ll be here all day, but can also be reached on Twitter @bruce_v3

(P.S. It’s my first launch!)

articles.description:
“
        Hi Product Hunters. I built this digital menu creator that generates QR code for restaurant owners.

🤔 Problem
Covid made restaurants create these digital menus with QR codes that customers can scan to view their menus. I’m sure that this is pretty annoying for restaurant owners that have to spend more money on hiring someone to make this happen. Small restaurants might not even bother spending the money on it.

⚒ Solution
A simple CRUD app that allows users to create digital menus for their restaurants. Users can create their menu and each menu get two QR codes, one private one for the restaurant owner to access if he/she ever wants to make changes to his/her menu, and second set of QR codes for customers to view the menu.  The user can print out these QR codes and stick them on their tables.

📋 Status
This is a pretty crude MVP. It took me a few hours to put it together. Hope ya’ll enjoy!
        ”
        
Discussion
        |
        Link
articles.title: QR Code Ninja — Pandemic proof digital menus for restaurants

articles.description:
So why I created Radiopush?
I love music, and using Spotify changed my life, but being exposed to so many songs and albums made me confused. While Spotify mixes are a fantastic way to explore new music I missed the human touch, the excitement of sharing a new song with a friend, and celebrating a shared passion for some crazy band that only a few knows.

It's open source
This project is for the community, and that's why all the source code is open (https://github.com/puemos/radiopush).
It's not about the money, I did it because I wanted to use it, I just hope enough people will join the platform so I can discover more music :)

What you can do:
- Login with Spotify for maximum security (no need to register)
- Create private channels to share with close friends
- Make public channels to share with the world your amazing taste in music
- Post songs with Spotify links
- Preview the songs from the platform
- Add reactions
- (Coming soon) Add songs to your Spotify playlists
        ”
        
Discussion
        |
        Link
articles.title: Radiopush — Share and discover songs with friends, colleagues and family
